title: Create TypeDistributionChart
description: Create src/components/dashboard/TypeDistributionChart.tsx. Pie or donut chart showing memory distribution by type. Use type colors from design system. Show percentages. Use recharts or chart.js.

title: Create StaleMemoriesAlert
description: Create src/components/dashboard/StaleMemoriesAlert.tsx. Alert banner when needsReview memories exist. Show count. Link to filtered memories list (?needsReview=true). Dismissible for session.

title: GET /api/v1/memories - list with filters
description: Create server/api/memories.ts route. Query params: type (filter), tags (array), sort (created|accessed|importance|title), order (asc|desc), cursor, limit (default 20). Return {data: Memory[], nextCursor, prevCursor, hasMore}.

title: Create empty state components
description: Create EmptyState component for: no memories found, no search results, no stale memories. Illustration + helpful message + action button (e.g., "Create first memory").

title: Configure TypeScript strict mode
description: Set up tsconfig.json with strict mode, path aliases (@/), and proper JSX settings for React 19. Include tsconfig.node.json for Vite config.

title: Create MemoryForm component
description: Create src/components/memory-form/MemoryForm.tsx. React Hook Form with Zod validation (CreateMemoryInput schema). Fields: title, type dropdown, content (textarea/markdown editor), summary, importance slider, tags input, related files.

title: Create CORS middleware
description: Configure Hono CORS middleware. Allow only localhost origins. Allow standard methods and headers. No credentials needed for local tool.

title: Create memory Zod schemas (shared)
description: Create src/types/memory.ts with Zod schemas: MemoryType enum, MemorySchema, CreateMemoryInput, UpdateMemoryInput. These schemas are shared between frontend forms and backend validation. Match MCP server schema.

title: Create ImportanceSlider component
description: Create src/components/primitives/ImportanceSlider.tsx. Slider input for importance (0-1). Show value as percentage. Use shadcn Slider. Color gradient from muted to accent based on value.

title: Create memory create mutation
description: Create useCreateMemory() mutation in src/features/memories/mutations.ts. POST to /api/v1/memories. On success: invalidate memoryKeys.lists(), navigate to new memory detail.

title: Create Score display component
description: Create src/components/primitives/Score.tsx. Display search relevance score (0-100%). Circular progress or horizontal bar. Color based on score (red < 40, yellow < 70, green >= 70).

title: Configure Tailwind with OKLCH custom properties
description: Install tailwindcss, postcss, autoprefixer. Create tailwind.config.ts with OKLCH color tokens from plan. Configure dark mode (class strategy). Add custom shadows (shadow-sm, shadow-md, shadow-inset, shadow-lift).

title: Implement keyboard shortcuts
description: Create src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcuts.ts. Global shortcuts: Cmd+K (search), Cmd+N (new memory), Escape (close modals). Use react-hotkeys-hook or custom. Show shortcut hints in UI.

title: Create MemoryRepository class
description: Create server/db/memories.ts with MemoryRepository. Methods: findMany(filters), findById(id), create(data), update(id, data), delete(id). Use prepared statements. Use withRetry for writes.

title: Epic: Phase 3 - Search Backend
description: Vector search, keyword search, hybrid scoring.

title: Load sqlite-vec extension
description: In DatabaseManager, load sqlite-vec extension. Verify with a test query. Show clear error message if extension not found. Document installation requirements.

title: Create query key factory for memories
description: Create src/features/memories/queries.ts. Export memoryKeys object with: all, lists(), list(filters), details(), detail(id), search(query, filters). Used for cache invalidation.

title: Create Memory detail route
description: Create src/routes/memories/$memoryId.tsx. Load memory by ID param. Layout: main content area (markdown) + metadata sidebar. Breadcrumb navigation. 404 handling.

title: Epic: Phase 0 - Foundation
description: Project initialization, testing setup, configuration. Must complete before any other work.

title: Create stats query hook
description: Create src/features/stats/hooks.ts with useStats(). Uses useQuery. GET from /api/v1/stats. Cache for 60 seconds. Returns {totalMemories, countByType, recentMemories, staleCount, topTags}.

title: Set up Vitest for unit/integration testing
description: Install vitest, @testing-library/react. Create vitest.config.ts. Add test script to package.json. Create a dummy test to verify setup works.

title: Create MemoryMetadata sidebar
description: Create src/components/memory/MemoryMetadata.tsx. Display: type badge, importance slider (read-only), tags, experts list, created/accessed dates, git commit link, source PR link. Edit button.

title: Performance optimization
description: Analyze bundle with vite-bundle-visualizer. Lazy load routes. Optimize images. Add loading="lazy" to non-critical content. Target < 200kb initial bundle.

title: Epic: Phase 11 - Dashboard
description: Dashboard stats, charts, recent memories.

title: Create MemoryTypeBadge component
description: Create src/components/primitives/MemoryTypeBadge.tsx. Badge showing memory type (decision/solution/pattern/architecture/note). Each type has distinct OKLCH color from design system. Use shadcn Badge as base.

title: DELETE /api/v1/memories/:id - delete memory
description: Create DELETE handler. Return 404 if not found. Delete from both memories table and vectors table. Return 204 on success.

title: Set up TanStack Router
description: Install @tanstack/react-router. Create routes/ directory structure: __root.tsx, index.tsx (dashboard), memories/index.tsx, memories/$memoryId.tsx, memories/new.tsx, search.tsx. Configure file-based routing.

title: GET /api/v1/stats - dashboard statistics
description: Create server/api/stats.ts route. Return: totalMemories, countByType {decision, solution, pattern, architecture, note}, recentMemories (last 5), staleMemories (needsReview=true), topTags (top 10).

title: Create DatabaseManager singleton with WAL mode
description: Create server/db/connection.ts with DatabaseManager class. Lazy initialization of bun:sqlite. Enable WAL mode, busy_timeout=5000, foreign_keys=ON. Handle connection errors gracefully.

title: Set up shadcn/ui
description: Run `bunx shadcn@latest init`. Configure with New York style, Slate colors (will override with OKLCH). Add core components: button, card, input, dialog, dropdown-menu, command, table, badge, tooltip.

title: Create TagAutocomplete component
description: Create src/components/memory-form/TagAutocomplete.tsx. Combobox that fetches existing tags from /api/v1/tags. Allow creating new tags. Multiple selection. Show tag as pills.

title: Implement retry logic for database operations
description: Create server/db/retry.ts with withRetry() function. Exponential backoff (100ms, 200ms, 400ms). Catch SQLITE_BUSY errors. Max 3 retries. Log retry attempts.

title: Initialize Vite + React 19 project with Bun
description: Set up the base project using `bun create vite` with React template. Configure for React 19. Create package.json with scripts for dev/build/preview. Verify hot reload works.

title: Create Sidebar component
description: Create src/components/layout/Sidebar.tsx. Logo at top. Navigation links: Dashboard, Memories, Search. Active state with bg-bg-elevated and accent border-left. Use shadow-md.

title: POST /api/v1/memories - create memory
description: Create POST handler. Validate body with CreateMemoryInput schema. Generate UUID. Set createdAt/accessedAt to now. Return created memory with 201 status.

title: GET /api/v1/memories/:id - get single memory
description: Create GET handler for single memory. Return 404 if not found. Optionally include relations (query param ?include=relations).

title: Create Dashboard route
description: Create src/routes/index.tsx (dashboard). Layout: StatsGrid at top, RecentMemories + StaleMemoriesAlert below, TypeDistributionChart. Responsive grid layout.

title: Create responsive layout
description: Add media queries to Shell. Mobile: sidebar collapses to hamburger menu. Tablet: sidebar as overlay. Desktop: full sidebar. Use Tailwind responsive classes.

title: Create MemoryCard component (grid view)
description: Create src/components/memory-list/MemoryCard.tsx. Card showing: title, type badge, truncated summary (2 lines), tags, importance indicator. Hover lift effect. Click navigates to detail.

title: Set up Playwright for E2E testing
description: Install @playwright/test. Create playwright.config.ts. Add e2e script. Create a smoke test that loads the app.

title: Create useMemories hook
description: Create src/features/memories/hooks.ts with useMemories(filters). Uses useQuery with memoryKeys.list(filters). Fetches from /api/v1/memories with query params. Returns {data, isLoading, error, hasNextPage, fetchNextPage}.

title: GET /api/v1/tags - list tags with counts
description: Create server/api/tags.ts route. Query all unique tags from memories, count occurrences. Return {tags: [{name, count}], total}. Cache result for 60 seconds.

title: Create RecentMemories component
description: Create src/components/dashboard/RecentMemories.tsx. List of 5 most recently accessed memories. Show title, type badge, accessed date (relative time). Click navigates to detail.

title: Implement KNN semantic search
description: In VectorRepository, implement knnSearch(queryEmbedding, k). Use sqlite-vec's vec_knn function. Return array of {memoryId, distance}. Lower distance = more similar.

title: Epic: Phase 2 - Backend API
description: All REST API endpoints for memories, tags, stats.

title: Create RelatedFiles component
description: Create src/components/memory/RelatedFiles.tsx. List of file paths related to memory. File icon based on extension. Click to copy path. Truncate long paths.

title: Create memory detail query hook
description: Create useMemory(id) hook in src/features/memories/hooks.ts. Uses useQuery with memoryKeys.detail(id). Fetches from /api/v1/memories/:id. Handles 404 error state.

title: Create ScoreBreakdown visualization
description: Create src/components/search/ScoreBreakdown.tsx. Expandable section showing: semantic score (%), keyword score (%), hybrid weight used. Bar chart or simple breakdown. Helps users understand why result ranked high/low.

title: Epic: Phase 12 - Polish
description: Skeletons, error handling, accessibility, performance.

title: Create SearchCommand component (Cmd+K)
description: Create src/components/search/SearchCommand.tsx. Use shadcn Command component. Global keyboard shortcut Cmd+K / Ctrl+K. Modal overlay with glass effect. Search input with debounce (300ms). Show recent searches when empty.

title: Create DeleteConfirmDialog
description: Create src/components/memory/DeleteConfirmDialog.tsx. AlertDialog with memory title. Confirm/Cancel buttons. Destructive styling for confirm.

title: Implement keyword search (LIKE)
description: In MemoryRepository, add keywordSearch(query, fields). Search in title, content, summary using LIKE %query%. Return matches with count of keyword occurrences for scoring.

title: Create memory update mutation
description: Create useUpdateMemory() mutation. PATCH to /api/v1/memories/:id. Optimistic update using setQueryData. On error: rollback and show toast.

title: Create StatsGrid component
description: Create src/components/dashboard/StatsGrid.tsx. Cards showing: total memories, decisions count, solutions count, patterns count. Each card has icon, count, label. Use shadow-sm with hover lift.

title: Create hybrid score normalization
description: Create server/lib/scoring.ts with hybridScore(semanticDistance, keywordMatches, maxDistance, maxMatches, weight=0.7). Convert distance to similarity (1 - d/maxD). Normalize keyword (matches/maxMatches). Return weighted combination.

title: Create error boundary component
description: Create src/components/ErrorBoundary.tsx. Catch React errors. Show friendly error message with retry button. Log error details. Reset on navigation.

title: POST /api/v1/search endpoint
description: Create server/api/search.ts. Body: {query, type?, tags?, limit?, hybridWeight?}. Get query embedding (from existing MCP embedding or error). Run KNN + keyword search. Combine with hybrid scoring. Return {results: [{memory, score, breakdown}]}.

title: Create VectorRepository for sqlite-vec
description: Create server/db/vectors.ts with VectorRepository. Connect to vectors.db. Methods: findSimilar(embedding, limit), getEmbedding(memoryId). Handle case where embedding doesn't exist.

title: Create loading skeleton components
description: Create src/components/ui/Skeleton.tsx. Shimmer animation. Create specific skeletons: MemoryTableSkeleton (5 rows), MemoryCardSkeleton, MemoryDetailSkeleton, StatsSkeleton. Use throughout app during loading states.

title: Create MemoryFilters component
description: Create src/components/memory-list/MemoryFilters.tsx. Filter dropdowns: type (multi-select), tags (combobox with search). Filters sync to URL params. Clear filters button.

title: Create memory delete mutation
description: Create useDeleteMemory() mutation. DELETE to /api/v1/memories/:id. Show confirmation dialog first. On success: invalidate lists, navigate to memories index.

title: Create ViewToggle component
description: Create src/components/memory-list/ViewToggle.tsx. Toggle between table and grid view. Persisted in URL param (?view=table|grid). Icon buttons for each view.

title: Implement optimistic updates
description: In update mutation, use React 19's useOptimistic or TanStack Query's optimistic update pattern. Immediately update UI, revert if request fails. Show toast on revert.

title: Create error handling middleware
description: Create server/middleware/error-handler.ts. Catch all errors. Format as JSON {code, message, details}. Log errors with request ID. Return appropriate HTTP status codes.

title: Add dark/light theme toggle
description: Create src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx. Toggle between dark (default) and light mode. Persist to localStorage. Respect prefers-color-scheme on first load. Add to Header.

title: Create MemoryTable component
description: Create src/components/memory-list/MemoryTable.tsx. Columns: title, type (badge), importance, tags, created, accessed. Sortable headers. Row click navigates to detail. Use shadcn Table with inset shadow style.

title: Create MemoryContent component
description: Create src/components/memory/MemoryContent.tsx. Render markdown content using react-markdown or similar. Code syntax highlighting. Proper typography (line height, spacing).

title: Create globals.css with design tokens
description: Create src/styles/globals.css. Define all OKLCH CSS variables from plan: bg-base/subtle/surface/elevated, text-primary/secondary/muted, accent colors, type colors (decision/solution/pattern/architecture/note), glass variables, shadow variables.

title: Epic: Phase 5-6 - Layout & Primitives
description: Shell layout, sidebar, header, primitive components.

title: Create Shell layout component
description: Create src/components/layout/Shell.tsx. Full-height flex container. Sidebar on left (fixed width 240px), main content area with header on top. Use bg-bg-base for main, bg-bg-surface for sidebar.

title: Create useSearch hook
description: Create src/features/search/hooks.ts with useSearch(query, options). Uses useQuery with memoryKeys.search(). POST to /api/v1/search. Returns {results, isLoading, error}. Enabled only when query.length >= 2.

title: Add prefers-reduced-motion support
description: Create @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) styles. Disable: hover animations, glassmorphism blur, skeleton shimmer. Provide reduced-motion alternatives.

title: Create TagList component
description: Create src/components/primitives/TagList.tsx. Display array of tags as pills. Optional: clickable tags that filter. Truncate if more than N tags with "+X more" button. Muted text color.

title: Set up structured logging with pino
description: Install pino. Create server/lib/logger.ts with configurable log levels. Add request logging middleware for Hono.

title: Epic: Phase 8-9 - Memory Detail & CRUD
description: Memory detail view, create/edit forms, mutations.

title: Create Header component
description: Create src/components/layout/Header.tsx. Page title (dynamic from route). Quick search button (opens Cmd+K). Optional action buttons slot. Sticky top with backdrop blur.

title: Epic: Phase 1 - Backend Core
description: Hono server, database connection, error handling, repositories.

title: Epic: Phase 4 - Frontend Setup
description: Tailwind, shadcn, TanStack Router/Query setup.

title: Create API client with error handling
description: Create src/lib/api-client.ts. Fetch wrapper with base URL /api/v1. Handle JSON parsing. Throw typed errors (ApiError with code, message, details). Include request timeout.

title: Create MemoryList route component
description: Create src/routes/memories/index.tsx. URL search params for filters (type, tags, sort, order, view, cursor). Use TanStack Router's validateSearch. Render MemoryToolbar + MemoryTable/MemoryGrid.

title: POST /api/v1/search/similar/:id endpoint
description: Find memories similar to given memory. Get the memory's embedding, run KNN search excluding the source memory. Return top N similar memories with scores.

title: Implement cursor-based pagination
description: Create server/lib/pagination.ts. Cursor is base64url encoded JSON of {sortValue, id}. Decode cursor, build WHERE clause for "after cursor" logic. Support both forward and backward pagination.

title: Create SearchResults component
description: Create src/components/search/SearchResults.tsx. List of memory results. Each result shows: title, type badge, score, truncated summary. Click navigates to memory detail. Keyboard navigation (up/down arrows, enter to select).

title: Epic: Phase 10 - Search UI
description: Search command palette, results, score visualization.

title: Create config module with environment variables
description: Create server/config.ts with: docleaPath (from DOCLEA_PATH env or cwd/.doclea), port (from PORT or 3000), host (127.0.0.1 for security). Export LOCAL_DB and VECTOR_DB paths.

title: Create Hono server entry point
description: Create server/index.ts with Bun.serve() and Hono app. Mount API routes at /api/v1. Serve static files from dist/ in production. Bind to 127.0.0.1 only.

title: Epic: Phase 7 - Memory List
description: Memory list view with table/grid, filters, pagination.

title: PATCH /api/v1/memories/:id - update memory
description: Create PATCH handler. Validate body with UpdateMemoryInput (partial). Return 404 if not found. Return updated memory.

title: Accessibility audit and fixes
description: Run axe accessibility audit. Fix: focus indicators, aria labels, color contrast (4.5:1 minimum), keyboard navigation, screen reader announcements. Add skip-to-content link.

title: Set up TanStack Query
description: Install @tanstack/react-query. Create src/lib/query-client.ts with QueryClient config (staleTime: 30s, gcTime: 5min). Create QueryProvider wrapper in App.tsx.

title: Implement debounced search input
description: Create src/hooks/useDebounce.ts. Generic debounce hook. Use in SearchCommand to debounce query updates. Default 300ms delay. Cancel on unmount.
